Keywords: Armor , Dark Avengers , Spider-Man Family
Real Name: Harry Osborn
Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Secret Identity
TO BE THE SON NORMAN WANTED... OR NOT: The first time American Son would KO an opposing character of 25+ points, you may instead turn them to their last non-KO click. If you do, this game, America Son can use Perplex and modifies his combat values +1. If you don't, after resolutions, deal American Son 1 unavoidable damage and, this game, he can use Outwit and deals penetrating damage.
ADAPTED FROM IRON MAN: Energy Shield/Deflection, Invulnerability.

Comments
October 3, 2020
mc268
This is a pretty good dial. He’s a great ranged option for Spider-Man family, and he has strong defences and indom. He can help carry a friend into battle and there’s a good power progression and selection. The stats are a little bland, but that’s all because of the real reason I love this figure. His trait is awesome, it may be a little hard to pull off, but wow, both choices are amazing. I prefer the perplex and stat boost, so he can help his team, and increase his average stats, but if you’re dealing with heavy reducers the other option is good too. I will spend an entire game chasing that trait, and it will likely cause me to lose some games, but the payoff is huge, and it makes games fun. The sculpt is also cool, and he is a great replacement option for Harry
